title: Motley Fool Money: 03.29.2013
description: On this week's show, we revisit two of our favorite interviews.  We talk with Dan Ariely, author of The Honest Truth About Dishonesty.  And former Gambino family associate Louis Ferrante talks about his book, Mob Rules: What the Mafia Can Teach the Legitimate Businessman.
content:encoded: On this week's show, we revisit two of our favorite interviews.  We talk with Dan Ariely, author of The Honest Truth About Dishonesty.  And former Gambino family associate Louis Ferrante talks about his book, Mob Rules: What the Mafia Can Teach the Legitimate Businessman.
